WDAM.QA.summary: Widam Food Company Q.P.S.C. engages in slaughtering of sheep and cattle in the State of Qatar. It is also involved in the import and trade of livestock, meat, and feed products; supply of fresh meat and related products; and sale of live and frozen meats. The company was formerly known as Qatar Company for Meat and Livestock Trading (MAWASHI) Q.S.C. and changed its name to Widam Food Company Q.P.S.C. in March 2013. Widam Food Company Q.P.S.C. was incorporated in 2003 and is based in Doha, Qatar.
